short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To quote Scotty, “I canna’ change the laws of physics.” but we do have the power to change our homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thats exactly what we have in our newly designed Galaxy extension. 
Transform your homepage with this inspirational browser page that will remind you that we are not alone in the galaxy. This browser extension was proudly designed by Calitech. All rights for technology design and content belong to Calitech.

Once installed you will get your local time and weather, quick access to your top sites and be able to customize the background by choosing your preferred image from one of the many options in our image library.
Enjoy using the Galaxy Extension and remember: “Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.”–Spock

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Galaxy Search extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to Microsoft Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at https://calitechmedia.com/products/galaxy-search/info/terms-and-conditions.html and Privacy Policy at https://calitechmedia.com/products/galaxy-search/info/privacy-policy.html.
